ValidationRule.description: Checks if the Referral is Stray, and Source is Stray, Wildlife, DOA – Stray or DOA – Wildlife then the Referral Organisation OR Contact is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), OR( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Animal_Source__c, "Stray"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Animal_Source__c, "Wildlife"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Animal_Source__c, "DOA - Stray"), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Animal_Source__c, "DOA - Wildlife") ), NOT( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(animalos__Referral_Organisation__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(animalos__Contact__c)) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Referral Organisation OR Contact is required.
